text: Slagle Creek is a stream in Bollinger and Wayne Counties in the U.S. state of Missouri. It is a tributary of Brush Creek. Slagle Creek has the name of J. A. Slagle, an early settler. ==See also== *List of rivers of Missouri ==References== Category:Rivers of Bollinger County, Missouri Category:Rivers of Wayne County, Missouri Category:Rivers of Missouri
title: Slagle Creek (Brush Creek tributary)
